text: Year of the Gun is a 1991 political thriller movie directed by John Frankenheimer and based on the novel of the same name by Michael Mewshaw. It stars Sharon Stone, Andrew McCarthy, Valeria Golino and John Pankow. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1991 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies set in Rome Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Frankenheimer
title: Year of the Gun (movie)
